resources.string: AWAAZ NGO - A VOICE FOR CHANGE
National Level Working Non Governmental Organization Registered Under Society Registration Act, 1860
We work and serve for a better world where everyone can live happily and with smiling Face. We feel happy in helping others and want to become helping hand of society.
We belive in helping other souls.
A nation wide organisation to help, motivate, empower those who are not capable.
AWAAZ NGO : A VOICE FOR CHANGE

Founded by Mr.Karanjeet Malik is a National Level Working Non Governmental Organization Registered Under Society Registration Act, 1860 having Head Office in Bulandshahr, Uttarpradesh. Awaaz Ngo’s main focus is on Social Service & Social Awareness.
“Education is a most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.”
“Champions keep playing until they get it right.”
We work and serve for a better world where everyone can live happily and with smiling Face. We feel happy in helping others and want to become helping hand of society.
